Calculate distance between assemblies

Source: R/plot-dendro.R
calculate_assembly_distance.Rd

Calculate distance between assemblies

Usage

calculate_assembly_distance(mat, method)

Arguments

mat

Matrix with assemblies as rows, orthogroups as columns

method

Distance method

Value

dist object
